name: Screws Loose (itch)
description:
You are a robot and you've got a few screws loose. Use it to your advantage!

  • Walk - A & D
  • Jump - W
  • Aim - Mouse pointer
  • Fire Limb - Left Mouse Button
  • Fired Arm mechanics:
    • Right Mouse Button - Follow arm
    • R - Retract arm
    • Some parts of the environment can be grabbed!
  • Fired Head mechanics:
    • Head will respawn after a few seconds
